contextual_description: WebShop task to find women's work & safety footwear with multiple style, comfort, size, color, and price constraints. Unsolved due to repeatedly focusing on mismatched high-priced or non-work items and not identifying any product satisfying all constraints.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me open toe, slip resistant women's work & safety footwear with arch support, high heel, ankle strap, memory foam with color: grey, and size: 8.5, and price lower than 30.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: Search results do not show any item that clearly matches all hard constraints (women's work & safety, open toe, slip resistant, arch support, high heel, ankle strap, memory foam, grey, size 8.5, price < $30), and the visible candidates either violate price or key attributes.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeatedly clicking into the same non-matching product (e.g., Alegria Women's Kourtney at $62.99+ or men's sneakers) and trying different sizes/colors instead of (1) explicitly checking description/features for required attributes, (2) scanning other search results or pages, or (3) concluding that no suitable product exists within constraints.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product page where the available sizes and colors clearly do not include the requested size (8.5) or color (grey), or the price range is already above the user's maximum budget.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Spending additional steps toggling sizes/colors on that same product (e.g., selecting size 5, 5-5.5 wide, or color 'anise baby tumble') instead of immediately returning to search results to look for a different candidate.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: Issuing multiple similar search queries that keep returning essentially the same result set, with no new items that satisfy the constraints.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Looping the same or slightly rephrased search queries (repeating long keyword strings) without adjusting strategy—such as relaxing non-critical constraints, changing category filters, or deciding that the task is infeasible under the given price/attribute combination.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The top search results include obviously irrelevant categories (e.g., men's running shoes, mattresses) or fashion sandals that are not work & safety footwear.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Treating these irrelevant items as viable candidates and clicking into them instead of refining the search (e.g., adding 'women', 'work & safety', or using category filters) or skipping them in favor of more relevant-looking results.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The user’s constraints are extremely restrictive (many required features plus a very low price cap) and no candidate in the result set satisfies both the functional requirements and the price.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Continuing to search and click aimlessly without ever acknowledging that no product meets all constraints, instead of explicitly concluding that no suitable item is available and, if allowed, suggesting trade-offs (e.g., higher price or dropping a non-essential feature).

contextual_description: WebShop task to find a men's apparel item with color, size, style, and price constraints. Unsolved due to repeated navigation and option selection without completing purchase.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me men's t-shirts & tanks with short sleeve, fashion design, long sleeve, button closure with color: e-orange, and size: small, and price lower than 40.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product detail page that already satisfies the user's constraints (men's t-shirt, short sleeve, fashion design, correct color option available, correct size option available, price under budget), with visible 'Buy Now' and no remaining unmet constraints.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeatedly toggling color/size options or re-opening the same product instead of proceeding to finalize the choice (e.g., not clicking 'Buy Now' or otherwise selecting the item as the answer).

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After returning to the search results, seeing multiple candidate products that may satisfy the constraints, but already having at least one product that clearly matches all user requirements.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Issuing nearly identical search queries and re-clicking the same product ID (e.g., B078WSND96) in a loop instead of either (1) confirming that product as the final recommendation or (2) briefly checking alternative candidates and then committing.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: Search results contain many irrelevant items (wrong gender, category, or price), but at least one clearly relevant item is present and already inspected.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Over-focusing on refining the search query text (e.g., repeating long, noisy queries with duplicated tokens like 'e-orange e-orange') instead of working with the existing relevant result and verifying it against the constraints.

contextual_description: WebShop task to purchase Home Decor wall art with Price and Attribute constraints. Unsolved due to incomplete satisfaction of material and usage constraints despite successful search, option selection, and purchase.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me ready hang wall art with solid wood for living room with color: fashion black woman, and size: 12x18 inch, and price lower than 60.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product page where the title explicitly states a different size (16x24 inch) than the user’s requested size (12x18 inch), even though a '12x18 inch' option appears in the size list but the page content/description does not update to confirm that size.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Proceeding directly to 'Buy Now' after clicking the desired size option without verifying in the product title/description that the selected variant actually matches the requested size and other constraints (ready-to-hang, solid wood, living room use).

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: User goal includes a material constraint (solid wood) but the product page does not mention that material anywhere in the title, description, or features.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Assuming the material requirement is satisfied and purchasing the item without confirming that it is made of solid wood.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The product appears to match color/theme and price, but some goal attributes (e.g., 'ready hang wall art with solid wood for living room') are only partially satisfied or not explicitly confirmed.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Optimizing for partial match (color, price, general wall art) and completing the purchase instead of either checking more details or returning to search for a product that explicitly satisfies all key constraints.

contextual_description: WebShop task to purchase Apparel with Style, Functional Feature, Size, and Price constraints. Unsolved due to selecting a mismatched, overpriced men's sneaker product instead of the specified women's pumps.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me open toe, non slip women's pumps with high heel, ankle strap, arch support, rubber sole with size: 8, and price lower than 70.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After the initial search, the first clicked product is clearly mismatched with the user’s constraints (men's mesh sports shoes, $100, not women's pumps, not under $70, and missing several required features).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Proceeding directly to 'Buy Now' on the mismatched product instead of going back to search results, refining filters, or inspecting other candidate items that might satisfy the detailed requirements.

contextual_description: WebShop task to find a men's top in Apparel with color, size, style, and price constraints. Unsolved due to not completing the purchase despite locating a matching item.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me men's t-shirts & tanks with short sleeve, fashion design, long sleeve, button closure with color: e-blue, and size: 3x-large, and price lower than 40.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product page that already satisfies all explicit constraints (men's t-shirt, short sleeve, fashion design, correct color option available, correct size option available, and price under the limit), with no further information needed to verify suitability.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Continuing to click color/size options or other non-terminal UI elements instead of selecting the product as a final answer (e.g., failing to use the appropriate 'Buy Now' or equivalent selection action to complete the task).

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After issuing a broad search that returns many candidate products, with at least one result title already clearly matching most of the requested attributes (men's, t-shirt, short sleeve, fashion/graphic style, price range).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Overloading the initial search query with repeated or overly specific tokens (e.g., repeating 'e-blue' and mixing multiple attribute phrases) instead of using a simpler query plus in-page filters and then systematically scanning top results.

contextual_description: WebShop task to purchase Apparel with Price and Attribute constraints. Unsolved due to selecting an item that only partially matched the specified attributes and constraints.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me men's boots with lace closure, rubber outsole, rubber sole with color: black, and size: 12, and price lower than 150.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product detail page where the displayed price is given as a range (e.g., '$132.0 to $150.26') and the user goal includes a strict upper price limit (price lower than $150.00).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Proceeding directly to purchase (e.g., clicking 'Buy Now') without verifying that the specific chosen size/color variant’s price is strictly below the user’s maximum price, thereby potentially selecting a variant that violates the price constraint.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After finding one candidate product that partially or ambiguously satisfies constraints (e.g., correct size and color, but price range overlaps or slightly exceeds the maximum).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Committing to that product instead of returning to the search results to compare other options that may clearly satisfy all constraints, including the strict price cap.

contextual_description: WebShop task to find a pair of men’s pants with laundering, fit, color, size, and price constraints. Unsolved due to repeatedly revisiting the same candidate product page without executing the purchase action.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me machine wash men's pants with relaxed fit with color: navy, and size: 38w x 34l, and price lower than 80.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product page where the color, size, and price already satisfy the user’s constraints, and the interface shows options like 'Description', 'Features', 'Reviews', and 'Buy Now'.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Continuing to click color/size options or going back to search instead of selecting 'Buy Now' (or otherwise finalizing the item) and presenting it as the chosen product.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After returning to the search results and seeing the same suitable product again that already matches the requested attributes (men's pants, navy, 38w x 34l, under $80).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeating the same search and product-page navigation loop (click product → click color → click size → back to search) without ever committing to the product or summarizing it as the answer.

contextual_description: WebShop task to search for and purchase women's footwear with price and attribute constraints. Unsolved due to repeatedly selecting mismatched items and not identifying a product satisfying the specified style, color, size, care, and support requirements.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me non slip, hand wash women's loafers & slip-ons with arch support with color: beige, and size: 7.5, and price lower than 60.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After issuing a search that returns a results page where none of the visible products match key constraints (women's loafers/slip-ons, beige color, size 7.5, price < $60), and the same non-matching items reappear across repeated identical searches.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeating the same search query and repeatedly clicking on the same clearly irrelevant products (e.g., men's running shoes or over-budget clogs) instead of either (1) scanning more of the result list via pagination, (2) relaxing or adjusting constraints (such as color or exact style) while preserving core requirements, or (3) concluding that no suitable item is available.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product detail page where the item obviously violates core user constraints (wrong gender category, wrong style, wrong color options, or missing required size), and these violations are visible in the title/options.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Staying in a loop of revisiting the same non-qualifying product (e.g., a men's running shoe with no women's sizing or beige color) instead of immediately returning to results and trying different items or adjusting the search strategy.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The only candidate that matches some constraints (e.g., women's, correct size) clearly violates a hard constraint such as maximum price.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Clicking into and reconsidering the over-budget product multiple times instead of discarding it as infeasible and either broadening the search (e.g., different style or color) or acknowledging that no product satisfies all constraints under the price cap.

contextual_description: WebShop task to find a men's apparel item with price and attribute constraints. Unsolved due to not verifying fabric, wash instructions, and specific size/color/fit details before purchase.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me wash cold, machine wash men's shirts with polyester heathers, heathers cotton, cotton heather, needle sleeve, classic fit with color: cranberry, and fit type: youth, and size: 3x-large, and price lower than 50.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product detail page that already matches many key constraints (price under $50, available cranberry color, youth fit type, 3x-large size) but where fabric/wash details are unknown or not yet checked.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Toggling the 'fit type' options (clicking 'youth' then 'men') instead of first inspecting the product's Description/Features to verify critical requirements like wash cold, machine wash, and specific fabric (polyester/cotton heather).

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After an initial broad search returns many generic T-shirts, and the goal includes multiple strict attributes (wash instructions, fabric blend, heather, sleeve type, fit, color, size, price).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Clicking the first arbitrary product (B09P39QN2W) without scanning the search results for items whose titles or metadata more closely match the required attributes (e.g., fabric, shirt type) or refining the search query/filters.

contextual_description: WebShop task to purchase an Electronics audio device with Price and Feature constraints. Unsolved due to repeatedly selecting a low-power alarm clock speaker instead of a high-power dedicated Bluetooth speaker under budget.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me high power bluetooth speakers for wireless bluetooth, and price lower than 130.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After performing a search, the results page lists multiple products including at least one item that clearly matches the goal constraints (a high‑power wireless Bluetooth speaker under $130, e.g., '80W Bluetooth Speaker... $99.99'), and the agent has not yet inspected that candidate product.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Clicking on and ultimately purchasing the first low‑relevance or partially relevant item (e.g., a kids alarm clock with Bluetooth) instead of systematically inspecting the most promising matching speaker candidates (e.g., the 80W Bluetooth speaker at $99.99) and verifying they satisfy the goal before buying.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On the search results page, there are multiple candidate items that could satisfy the goal, and the agent has already seen that a previously clicked item is not an ideal match (e.g., accessory, alarm clock, or overpriced amplifier).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeating the same search and re‑clicking the same non‑ideal product (looping between search and that product page) instead of exploring other candidate ASINs on the same results page or moving to the next page.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The user goal includes a strict price upper bound (e.g., $130) and the product detail page clearly shows a price above that bound.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Considering or purchasing an item that exceeds the specified price limit (e.g., $242.99 amplifier, $179.99 speaker) instead of immediately discarding it and returning to search results to find a compliant option.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: The goal specifies a particular product type (high‑power Bluetooth speakers) and the current product page or search result clearly belongs to a different category (e.g., headphones, earbuds, power cords, alarm clocks).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Treating any Bluetooth‑related product as acceptable and proceeding toward purchase, rather than filtering by correct product type (standalone speakers) and ignoring accessories or unrelated audio devices.

contextual_description: WebShop task to find a home office chair with price and attribute constraints. Unsolved due to looping between color options on a single product page without proceeding to purchase or exploring alternative results.

task_meta.original_goal: Find me height adjustable, high density, easy install, easy assemble home office chairs for living room with color: type 4-yellow, and price lower than 120.00 dollars.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: On a product detail page where the correct color/variant options are already visible, and the product appears to match key constraints (home office chair, price under budget, appropriate style/location).
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Repeatedly clicking back and forth between color variants (e.g., 'type 4-yellow' and 'type 1-yellow') without ever inspecting the product details (Description/Features) or proceeding to purchase, instead of verifying remaining constraints (height adjustable, high density, easy install/assemble) and then selecting 'Buy Now' if satisfied.

mistakes_to_avoid.trigger_condition: After returning to the search page and seeing the same promising product again as the only relevant chair under the price constraint.
mistakes_to_avoid.bad_action: Issuing nearly identical search queries and re-clicking the same product (B08P8LRFZ4) without changing strategy (e.g., reading description/features or confirming adjustability and assembly), causing a loop rather than progressing toward task completion.
